data.title: Bashar al
data.meta_description: Bashar al-Assad is the president of Syria and the head of the Ba'ath Party in Syria. Assad has held these positions since the death of his father Hafez al-Assad (1930-2000), who had ruled Syria since 1971.
data.text:
Bashar al-Assad (Arabic: بَشَارُ الْأَسَّد; born 11 September 1965) is the president of Syria and the head of the Ba'ath Party in Syria. Assad has held these positions since the death of his father Hafez al-Assad (1930-2000), who had ruled Syria since 1971.[1]
